summary: For once I would just like to have a good day. I would just like to have a good day and then be able to come home workout that...
body: For once I would just like to have a good day. I would just like to have a good day and then be able to come home workout that sinking feeling. I’d like to just be happy. I just want to be able to enter my house without all traces of my previous happiness evaporating the second I walk through at wreched door. That’s all. That’s it. Why is that so much to ask for.

reblog.comment: For once I would just like to have a good day. I would just like to have a good day and then be able to come home workout that sinking feeling. I’d like to just be happy. I just want to be able to enter my house without all traces of my previous happiness evaporating the second I walk through at wreched door. That’s all. That’s it. Why is that so much to ask for.

trail.content_raw: For once I would just like to have a good day. I would just like to have a good day and then be able to come home workout that sinking feeling. I’d like to just be happy. I just want to be able to enter my house without all traces of my previous happiness evaporating the second I walk through at wreched door. That’s all. That’s it. Why is that so much to ask for.
trail.content: For once I would just like to have a good day. I would just like to have a good day and then be able to come home workout that sinking feeling. I’d like to just be happy. I just want to be able to enter my house without all traces of my previous happiness evaporating the second I walk through at wreched door. That’s all. That’s it. Why is that so much to ask for.

summary:
I have been saving this drawing over two years probably, but I haven't had enough time to draw to be honest

Still, I'm spending...
caption:
I have been saving this drawing over two years probably, but I haven’t had enough time to draw to be honest

Still, I’m spending this night with my family and I’m kind of nostalgic if I’m honest. Can’t explain right now. I’m not good with words.

But

It’s not the spirit of the end of the year.

I want to wish you all a holy night, and a merry Christmas. Alone, with your partner, your pet, your beloved ones, whoever fullfil your heart.

I’m very sceptical about this holidays, but still the time I spend with my family sorta of gives meaning to these days.

Share a tight hug, merry Christmas ✨💕

summary: Art Summary for 2018 This year was kind of a nightmare but I made some pretty good art this year! I’m honestly surprised I still...
caption:
Art Summary for 2018

This year was kind of a nightmare but I made some pretty good art this year! I’m honestly surprised I still like pretty much all of these, I’m really happy with the art I made this year! Here’s to hoping 2019 holds even more development! 🥂

Links to each drawing: Jan., Feb., Mar., Apr., May., Jun., Jul., Aug., Sep., Oct., Nov., Dec.
